ch0126_00_haruka/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I’ve been waiting for you to show up!
ch0126_00_haruka/0101_0701_02_10:
Time to head out on an adventure of
new discoveries!
ch0126_00_haruka/7101_0701_02_10:
Are you having fun every day on Pasio? There’s
so much to do here—from hanging out to battling!
ch0126_00_haruka/7101_0701_03_10:
If you ever need a hand, just let me know! I’ll do
what I can to help!
ch0126_00_haruka/7102_0701_01_10:
Ever since I was really young, I’ve been traveling
around Hoenn to help my dad with his research.
ch0126_00_haruka/7102_0701_02_10:
It was so much fun that doing fieldwork became
my hobby.
ch0126_00_haruka/7102_0701_03_10:
I got so into it that before I knew it, my Pokédex
was full of information!
ch0126_00_haruka/7103_0701_01_10:
Battling can be fun, but I also like just walking
around town.
ch0126_00_haruka/7103_0701_02_10:
Lately, I’ve been having fun collecting cute
accessories to put in my hair! *giggle*
ch0126_00_haruka/7103_0701_03_10:
Also, whenever I find something that might come in
handy for fieldwork, I have to buy it!
ch0126_00_haruka/7104_0701_01_10: My rival, Brendan, is the best rival ever!
ch0126_00_haruka/7104_0701_02_10:
Back when we were in Hoenn, we battled a lot
and did a lot of stargazing, too.
ch0126_00_haruka/7104_0701_03_10: Once, we saw a shooting star. It was so pretty!
ch0126_00_haruka/7105_0701_01_10:
When I see you, I always think I have to 
try harder.
ch0126_00_haruka/7105_0701_02_10:
I wanna get stronger and see a lot of
different places.
ch0126_00_haruka/7105_0701_03_10:
You’re the first rival I’ve met who makes me feel
passionate about these things...aside from
Brendan, maybe!
ch0126_00_haruka/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, there you are! I was looking for you!
ch0126_00_haruka/1701_0701_02_10:
I wanted to give you something! Here, it’s a
present for you!
ch0126_00_haruka/1701_0702_01_10:
*giggle*
I found it when doing some fieldwork!
ch0126_00_haruka/2501_0701_01_10:
Brendan says he wants to be a Gym Leader
even more impressive than his dad!
ch0126_00_haruka/2501_0701_02_10:
I think it’s great that he’s working so hard with
the Pokémon he loves. It looks like he’s having a
lot of fun!
ch0126_00_haruka/2501_0701_03_10: That’s why I support his dream!
ch0126_00_haruka/2501_0702_01_10:
You know, my dream is to become friends with
Pokémon from all over the world!
ch0126_00_haruka/2501_0702_02_10:
But when I see Brendan, I start thinking that
maybe that’s not enough.
ch0126_00_haruka/2501_0702_03_10:
Sometimes, I get a little worried that I don’t know
what I want to be in the future.
ch0126_00_haruka/2501_0702_04_10:
I hope I can figure that out here on Pasio! If you
don’t mind, it’d be great if you could help me!
ch0126_00_haruka/2511_0701_01_10:
Do you have something that you really 
like to do, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0126_00_haruka/2511_0701_02_10:
If it’s better to make a job out of what you like to
do, then I want to be a professor, like my dad!
ch0126_00_haruka/2511_0701_03_10:
But also, it’s probably not enough to just think that
I want to be like him.
ch0126_00_haruka/2511_0702_01_10:
*giggle* When I start going down that train of
thought, there’s really no end to it!
ch0126_00_haruka/2511_0702_02_10:
I want to travel the world and become friends
with all the Pokémon I meet.
ch0126_00_haruka/2511_0702_03_10:
Maybe by doing that, I might come to learn
what I want to do in the future.
ch0126_00_haruka/2511_0702_04_10: Yup, that’s it! No more worrying about it!
ch0126_00_haruka/2511_0702_05_10: I feel better now after talking to you! Thanks!
ch0126_00_haruka/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! Each day on Pasio is full of fun
things to experience! I hope today’s no different!
ch0126_00_haruka/3003_0701_01_10:
Sometimes I wish Pasio had wild Pokémon
to discover.
ch0126_00_haruka/3005_0701_01_10:
Going for walks at night is kinda nice, you know?
I just love the nighttime air.
